text:
Version 1.1 of Crimson has a SAX 2.0 driver that claims it doesn't
support the string-interning feature. The fact is that Crimson does support this, it's just that you can't turn it off. Crimson should report as much
through its SAX driver, for the convenience of client software.

(Reported on Xerces-J, since there is no separate project for Crimson.
(Ought to be, though.))
